name: Sky Croc
description:
Made for Two button jam

the 2 buttons are:
Z to jump(can jump in air)
X to do dash attack(moves you until you hit an enemy)
Try to get the highest score possible

Your playing as Sky Croc, a key player in the crocodiles battle to become the dominant species on a remote island (a prequel to Damn Mutant Crocodiles)

Tip: u can dash through the lightning

used lights out as the background music
Reused sounds from my previous games
